title: Crime Inc. - Volume 1.
brief_description: First volume in a two volume series which traces the origins and operations of the Mafia in the U.S.A. Includes footage of interviews with FBI informers and home movie clips providing background to Mafia “families” today - their allegiances, lifestyles and feuds. The video is divided into two parts: “All in the family” and “The Making of the mob”. Written and narrated by Martin Short.
